ai-patthana21.23:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.23:1.1_0: One should not give up without seeing or cause, without reason, be given up.
ai-patthana21.23:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.23:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the cause of development to give up the reason for developing the skillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.23:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.23:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up a teaching without seeing its development, because of not seeing its cause, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.23:3.1_1: Neither have no cause or condition for the sake of development, nor for the sake of seeing, nor for the sake of developing and cultivating the path to development.
ai-patthana21.23:3.1_2: In brief, the root of all is reckoned as one,
